channel.title: Hedy Fry
channel.description: Recent news about Hedy Fry, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Hundreds of constituents are contacting my office urging @pmharper to recall #Parliament for debate on Canada's role in Syria.

item.title: Mentioned by Straight.com
item.description:
Liberal MP Hedy Fry seeks public input on prescription drugs
Dr. Hedy Fry is convinced that Canadians are paying far too much for prescription drugs, either individually or through insurance plans. In a phone interview with the Georgia Straight, the veteran Vancouver Centre MP and Liberal health critic even put a price ...

item.title: Mentioned by Langley Times
item.description:
Fry needs to get out more often
Updated: August 26, 2013 4:46 PM. A chuckle almost turned into a belly laugh when I heard last week that Vancouver Centre Liberal MP Hedy Fry was going to take the issue of four-laning the Trans-Canada Highway in B.C. to a Liberal Party policy meeting.

item.title: Mentioned by Hill Times (subscription)
item.description:
Political loans bill 'basically dead,' says NDP MP Scott
Liberal MP Hedy Fry (Vancouver Centre, B.C.) told The Hill Times she has about $40,000 left in outstanding debt from her 2006 Liberal leadership campaign (Elections Canada records show an outstanding balance of $69,000). “We have this amount left and ...

item.title: Mentioned by Hill Times (subscription)
item.description:
Four 2006 Liberal leadership candidates still owe money, Elections Canada can ...
As of July 30, Liberal MP Stéphane Dion owed $7,500, former Liberal MP Ken Dryden owed $225,000, Liberal MP Hedy Fry owed $69,000 and former Liberal MP Joe Volpe owed $97,800. By BEA VONGDOUANGCHANH | Published: Tuesday, 07/30/2013 ...

item.title: Mentioned by The Province
item.description:
Fry fawns over leader
Vancouver Liberal MP Hedy Fry could hardly have been more lavish in her praise of federal Liberal leader Justin Trudeau when she informs us that "he is not like other politicians." She even adds that "when people see him there is a deep sense of trust.
